lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Thursday, Sept. 3 -- Chinese experts on Japanese affairs, in assessing the significance of the resignation of Foreign Minister Shigenori Togo, were generally agreed last night that it presaged "some bold move," but whether this meant imminent aggression against Siberia, as seemed to be the expectation of the average Chinese, these experts would not hazard a guess.
abstract: Jap Kwantung army reinforced by 5 divs
